```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#import data
ground_data <- read.csv(here("intermediate_files", "raw_elevation_values_ground.csv"))

ground_data <- ground_data %>% 
  mutate(error = Altitude - t_hae_m_1)

ground_mean <- mean(ground_data$error)
ground_sd <- sd(ground_data$error)
```
